page.title: 10** KEVIN'S SCHOOL DAY **
page.content: When I get up I go to the bathroom to wash,then dress and go downstairs for breakfast.During breakfast,I watch Breakfast T.V. Afterwards I go outside and feed the rabbit and guinea pig.Then I let my dog loose,it is then time to catch the school bus. When we get off the bus we usually have a 10 min. break before the bell goes. When we go into base the register is called and we go into the hall for assembly.After assembly we haveour work set out for us.Break is at 11.am to 11.20am.We carry on with our work until dinner,we take it in turns to work on the computer.We have our lunch at 12.30pm and some children bring in sandwiches.Then we have play until 1.30pm.Art+Craft is in the afternoon and then we tidy up in the afternoon.On Fridays we go swimming and we go home at 3.15pm.
